message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $15000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and holds significant value for us. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, and we're confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality of your product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $12000 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we agree on a price of $13500 for the product? I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my budget constraints, I am unable to go beyond $12000 for this product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
